content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5)
- Pipes connecting the offshore pump to the steam engine (positions include various pipe connections)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 0, 0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the distance between entities does not exceed the maximum connection distance for pipes. If it does, add intermediate pipes to bridge the gap.
- Make sure to place pipes correctly by checking the positions of the entities being connected to avoid connection failures.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to a power network. Check for any disconnected entities and rectify the connections.
